      • CACHE_URI

        public static final java.lang.String CACHE_URI
        Key used to optionally define the path for the download cache. If not specified, a new cache will automatically be created in the default system directory on the same storage as the source.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CACHE_DIR

        public static final java.lang.String CACHE_DIR
        Key used to optionally define the download directory for the download cache. If not specified, a new cache will automatically be created in the specified directory (using the value associated with TITLE on the same storage as the source.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SOURCE_URI

        public static final java.lang.String SOURCE_URI
        Key used to define the URI of the layer being cached

      • QUEUE_SIZE

        Key used to describe the number of tilesets left to download in the queue
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • JOB_UID

        public static final java.lang.String JOB_UID
        Key used to enable clients to deconflict events on a per-job basis. The JOB_UID specified when starting a download will be included in all events braodcast during that job's execution.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ON_COMPLETE_CALLBACK

        public static final java.lang.String ON_COMPLETE_CALLBACK
        Key used to define an Intent to be broadcast when the download is complete. When not specified, a default action to re-scan imagery layers will be broadcast.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

public boolean isOnline()

        Returns if the network is determined to be online. This does not take into account networks supplied by physical radio connections.
